text: Maria Heubuch (born 12 December 1958) is a German politician and Member of the European Parliament (MEP) representing Germany since July 2014. She is a member of the Alliance 90/The Greens, part of the European Green Party.http://www.europarl.europa.eu/meps/en/124848/MARIA_HEUBUCH_history.html Prior to entering politics Heubuch worked as a farmer and was a carer. She also served in various roles within the German farming community such as Federal Chair of the Working Group on Small-Scale Farming, District team member of the Association of German Dairy Farmers and Board member of the Association for the Preservation of Family Farms. ==Parliamentary service== *Vice-Chair, Delegation for relations with the Pan-African Parliament (2014-) *Member, Committee on Development (2014-) *Member, Delegation to the ACP-EU Joint Parliamentary Assembly (2014-) ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Alliance 90/The Greens MEPs Category:German farmers Category:MEPs for Germany 2014–2019 Category:21st-century women MEPs for Germany Category:People from Ravensburg
title: Maria Heubuch
